pr_title: Support multiple ways to analyze segments in rest

timeline.message: Support multiple ways to analyze segment data

timeline.author: kezhenxu94

replies.bodyText: @kezhenxu94 This will break the e2e, LUA agent, and test tool.
replies.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText: If we really hope to break the endpoint, consider using /segment and /segments, which could represent better. But before the change, need to update the test tool and LUA agent, then back to this PR.
replies.author: wu-sheng

timeline.bodyText: I don't think this is a good example. This is not an official format in JSON.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText: And isn't better than the official JSON list way.
replies.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText: It adapts to the current LUA agent. Should I need to fix the LUA first? let the LUA agent using the JSON object or JSON list.
